participant_1.background:
I sometimes feel like my pets are the only ones who truly understand me.
I recently enjoyed a wine tour with my friends.
I love being in nature, which helps me clear my mind and relax after a long day of gaming.
if things are not done right i will redo them again and again.
sometimes i feel like i have already been through life once before.

participant_2.background:
I live in a place with a warm climate where I can keep my iguana.
My family members all have different jobs, but we all share a love for animals.
I don't know much about my parents.
i am not going to go the extra mile anymore.
I treasure the watch my father gave me for my birthday because it is a reminder of our relationship.

content.text: Hey, I'm interested in hearing more about your pets.
I have a pet iguana, he's a green iguana and he's a total sweetheart.
That's so cool! I've never seen a green iguana before, I've only seen red iguanas.
Yeah, they're pretty rare. I live in a warm climate so I can keep him outside most of the time.
That's awesome, I wish I could have a pet iguana.
I live in a pretty cold climate so I don't think an iguana would be able to survive outside here.
Yeah, they're not really cold weather animals.
But I would love to have one someday, they're so cool.
They are, they're really great pets.
What's your favorite thing about your iguana?
I love his personality, he's really friendly and he loves to cuddle.
That's so cute! I love it when animals are cuddly.
